testcase.name: 99.23-TestCase-accounting-concepts-dimensional
testcase.description: Rule of thumb: This report model and report is XBRL valid but the representation approach is inconsistent with best practices for representing accounting concepts. Accounting concepts should be Line Items, not Members of a Dimension.

variation.name: accounting-concepts-dimensional
variation.description: Rule of thumb: This report model and report is XBRL valid but the representation approach is inconsistent with best practices for representing accounting concepts. Accounting concepts should be Line Items, not Members of a Dimension.
